verses.verse: And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4729>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on: of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

A <S%H520>cubit<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof; <S%H7251>foursquare<s%> shall it be: and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof: the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof shall be of the same.

And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H1406>top<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7023>sides<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof; and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> to it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> to it <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2213>crown<s%> of it, by the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>corners<s%> thereof, on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> of it shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> it; and they shall be for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it <S%H1992>with.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> that is by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat that is <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> every <S%H1242>morning:<s%> when he <S%H3190>dresses<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> incense on it.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>lights<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> on it, a <S%H8548>perpetual<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

You shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> nor <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice, nor meat <S%H4503>offering;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H5262>drink<s%> offering <S%H5921>thereon.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it <S%H259>once<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering of <S%H3725>atonements:<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall he make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on it throughout your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> after their <S%H6485>number,<s%> then shall they <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when you <S%H6485>number<s%> them; that there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5063>plague<s%> among them, when you <S%H6485>number<s%> them.

<S%H2088>This<s%> they shall <S%H5414>give,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> them that are <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> (a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs:<s%>) an <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> them that are <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>above,<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not give <S%H7235>more,<s%> and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not give <S%H4591>less<s%> than <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> when they <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation;<s%> that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>laver<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%> also of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> with: and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>therein.<s%>
For <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereat:

When they <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not; <S%H176>or<s%> when they <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not: and it shall be a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to them, even to him and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you also to you <S%H7218>principal<s%> <S%H1314>spices,<s%> of <S%H1865>pure<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels, and of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> so <S%H4276>much,<s%> even two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels, and of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels,
And of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> an <S%H1969>hin:<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it an <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>ointment,<s%> an <S%H4888>ointment<s%> <S%H4842>compound<s%> after the <S%H4639>are<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary:<s%> it shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> therewith, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%>
And the <S%H7979>table<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
And the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them, that they may be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy:<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them, that they may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> to me throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

On <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall it not be <S%H3251>poured,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> any other <S%H3644>like<s%> it, after the <S%H4971>composition<s%> of it: it is <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you.

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H7543>compounds<s%> any <S%H3644>like<s%> it, or <S%H834>whoever<s%> <S%H5414>puts<s%> any of it on a <S%H2114>stranger,<s%> shall even be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> to you <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices,<s%> <S%H5198>stacte,<s%> and <S%H7827>onycha,<s%> and <S%H2464>galbanum;<s%> these <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense:<s%> of <S%H905>each<s%> shall there be a like weight:

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H7004>perfume,<s%> a <S%H7545>confection<s%> after the <S%H4639>are<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary,<s%> <S%H4414>tempered<s%> together, <S%H2889>pure<s%> and <S%H6944>holy:<s%>

And you shall <S%H7833>beat<s%> some of it <S%H1854>very<s%> <S%H1854>small,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you: it shall be to you <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And as for the <S%H7004>perfume<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make,<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves according to the <S%H4971>composition<s%> thereof: it shall be to you <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to that, to <S%H7306>smell<s%> thereto, shall even be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
